Package net.royalur

Class GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<R extends Roll,SELF extends GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<R,SELF>>

java.lang.Object
net.royalur.GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<R,SELF>
Type Parameters:
R - The type of rolls that the dice produce.
SELF - The type of the subclass of this builder.
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameBuilder.StandardGameBuilder, GameBuilder.StandardWithDiceGameBuilder
Enclosing class:
GameBuilder
public abstract static class GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<R extends Roll,SELF extends GameBuilder.BaseStandardGameBuilder<R,SELF>> extends Object
A builder for constructing games that follow the standard rules.

      paths - The paths that each player must take around the board.
      safeRosettes - Whether rosette tiles are safe squares for pieces.

    • copy

      @Nonnull protected abstract SELF copy(@Nonnull BoardShape boardShape, @Nonnull PathPair paths, boolean safeRosettes, int startingPieceCount)
      Copies this game builder with new settings.
      Parameters:
      boardShape - The shape of the board.
      paths - The paths that each player must take around the board.
      safeRosettes - Whether rosette tiles are safe squares for pieces.
      startingPieceCount - The number of pieces that each player starts with.
      Returns:
      A copy of this game builder with updated settings.

      @Nonnull public SELF safeRosettes(boolean safeRosettes)

      Parameters:
      safeRosettes - Whether rosette tiles are safe squares for pieces.
      Returns:

      Returns:

    • buildRules

      @Nonnull public abstract RuleSet<StandardPiece,PlayerState,R> buildRules()
      Generates a standard rule set to match the settings in this builder. The rules do not contain any player identification information set in this builder.
      Returns:
      A standard rule set to match the settings in this builder.
